subject: Alzheimer's Disease
Basketball
Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Pat Summitt, who received a diagnosis of early onset Alzheimer’s last year, will take the title of head coach emeritus, and longtime assistant Holly Warlick will replace her.
snippet: Pat Summitt, who received a diagnosis of early onset Alzheimer’s last year, will take the title of head coach emeritus, and longtime assistant Holly Warlick will replace her.
